item.title: Product definition
item.description: The Company A former software factory looking to reinvent itself as a product company. They had built the same product several times for different clients and wanted to use that as the starting point for a product. What they had They had a set of microservices in place, several versions of custom digital wallets made for clients, and a web aplication where clients could see reports and access settings. They had created this diagram with information on all the pieces of software they had.
